sentences.en: Geneticist Danielle Reed has worked with many twins over the years and thought deeply about what twin studies have taught us.
sentences.cn: 遗传学家丹妮尔·里德多年来对许多双胞胎进行研究，深入思考了研究双胞胎教会了我们什么。

sentences.en: JH: That's a good question. You'll have to ask a geneticist.
sentences.cn: JH：问得好，不过你得问基因学家们。

sentences.en: But Obeng said she would recommend that they see a geneticist after treatment.
sentences.cn: 但欧本说，在治疗后，她会建议他们去找一个遗传学家诊断一下。
